description.value:
Prerequisite: Minotaur, assassin, assassin's shroud power

Benefit: When you charge and use your goring charge racial power you and target has at least one of your assassin's shrouds on it, you gain a +2 bonus to your attack roll and, after resolving the attack, you can shift half your speed as part of the charge.

Revision (2/24/2010)

Change benefit to "When you charge and use your goring charge racial power you and target has at least one of your assassin's shrouds on it, you gain a +2 bonus to your attack roll and, after resolving the attack, you can shift half your speed as part of the charge."

Published in Dragon Magazine 382, page(s) 30.
